keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investment in our local NHS and schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting to protect local jobs by keeping Britain in the Single Market and investing in the NHS and schools.
Opposing the Conservatives' 'Dementia Tax' to ensure no one has to give up their home to pay for care.
Fighting against school cuts and reforms that would damage the educational system.
Campaigning against the Conservatives' hard Brexit plans to safeguard local jobs and businesses.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Lib Dems are the challengers here - they came a strong second to the Conservatives in the County elections across Henley Constituency.

issues.brexitEurope: Help Laura Coyle stop a hard Brexit. The Conservatives are dragging us out of the Single Market.
issues.education: Opposing school cuts and changes that would result in less funding for local schools.
issues.health: Leading the fight for investment in our local NHS.

community.content: Protecting local jobs by keeping Britain in the Single Market.

images.caption: The Liberal Democrats are winning across the UK.
Laura Coyle - The strong voice for us.
